channel.title: How can i make npc's stand were i want them to?
channel.description: i have shops open and i want to put them all in the same place can someone help me? ;D

item.title: How can i make npc's stand were i want them to?
item.dc:creator: @sean2 sean_
item.description:
@sean2 wrote:

open autospawn.cfg and look for the npc id or the shop cooridinates

lets say u wanted to change the fletching shop’s location. search for the current location and u should find something like this

spawn = 530	XXXX	YYYY	0	0	0	0	0	1	Fletching Shop

the “spawn = 530” is the npc id of the shop owner. the 2 after that are the coordiantes. the rest is what posistion he is facing, walking range, ect.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make npc's stand were i want them to?
